PYGAME PROJECT

**Introduction**

* The programming project using python language and using pygame library  
* [https://www.python.org/downloads/](https://www.python.org/downloads/) (Click here to download python)  
* [https://code.visualstudio.com/download](https://code.visualstudio.com/download) (Click here to download IDE: Visual Studio Code)   
* To install pygame follow these steps:   
  * Go into your terminal → type “pip install pygame” → follow the instruction to properly install and setup pygame  
  * After that, check whether pygame have properly installed by type “pip show pygame” in your terminal → it should show something like this:  
    ![][image1]

**Window Setup** 

In python, if you are using any other libraries with your python project, you must import it so you can get accessed

First of all, you will have to set up the screen for pygame. In pygame, you have to use pygame.display.set\_mode to create the window, the two parameters inside parentheses are the width and the height (being initialized to 800px) → The screen will be 800x800 px.

[image1]: <data:image/png;base64,>
